sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) has announced an ex-dividend date of November 28, 2012 and a cash dividend payment of $0.32 per share scheduled for December 14, 2012.
Shareholders who purchased SCL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 14.29% increase over the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $98.15, the dividend yield is 1.3%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $98.15, representing a -3.37% decrease from the 52 week high of $101.57 and a 37.37% increase over the 52 week low of $71.45.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Colgate-Palmolive Company ( CL ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $6.81.
Zacks Investment Research reports SCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2012 as -44.46%, compared to an industry average of -3.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
